name: Stat Block
description: A large metric value with label and optional trend indicator. The repeating unit inside dashboard summary cards and analytics panels.
notes: text-foreground-100 for the value — maximum contrast since the number is the focal point. text-foreground-400 for the label. Trend uses text-accent-400 for positive indicators.

variations.name: Compact
variations.description: Horizontal inline layout — value and label on one line. For use in dense sidebars and toolbars.

variations.name: With Icon
variations.description: Icon in a pill container above the number. Reinforces metric meaning visually.
